title: Please Mr. Officer
short_description: Digital transcript of George Floyd’s last moments
full_description: As part of Right In The Feels web show, I worked on putting together a digital version of the transcript of the events that lead to George Floyd’s death, "stripped of the trauma porn that fueled the mass sharing of the images online"

title: Dreamscape
short_description: Website for a real estate and property development company
full_description: ...a real estate and property development company with a primary focus on bringing financial and cultural value into their projects. They harness the eclectic energies of builders and dreamers to create a collection of properties that are beacons of who we are today, an where we’re going tomorrow.

title: Space Choir
full_description:
As part of my master’s project, the installation Space Choir accompanies the listener into a state of sonic contemplation by giving them the ability to interact with the scenography. Using a Kinect as a capture device and an Arduino, the sound and the LEDs respond to the user’s movement. 
Confronted with the lack of familiarity regarding this particular genre that is ambient music, the listener is invited to engage in it using their body within the surrounding space.
